name: The Wizard’s Secret Garden
description:
The Wizard’s Secret Garden -  Once upon a time in a wizard’s secret garden In a secret garden where people rarely come by.

The green wizard drowning in blue. Wondering who will be the one who fills full his heart?  " Please...., someone help me…."

Controls :

confirm:  Enter  or left mouse click

cancel:  x , 0 ,or  right mouse click 

move:  up and down arrow keys or click on the screen

Features:
  • 2 endings
  • 5-10 minute playthrough.
Social media Links:
  • Twitter
  • Tumblr

Credit:

BG music by :Davtrap & VividGlo

Note :  English is not my native language, sorry if there’s any grammar issue. 

Content Warning:  This game contains disturbing content such as depression, abuse, and body horror graphics.
